channel.title: Freezing script

item.title: Freezing script
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“reece844, post:4, topic:44143”][code]program New;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

const rockwait= 2000;
const rockcolor=9859920;

procedure minero;
begin
repeat
findcolorspiral(x,y,rockcolor,3,3,515,336)
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
istextat2(9,9,‘Mine’,20)
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
wait(rockwait+random(300))
until(invfull)
if (invfull = true) then
end;

Procedure dropal;
begin
dropto(2,28);
end;

procedure ban;
var
NoBan : Integer;
begin
if( not (loggedin))then Exit;
noban:=random(120)
case noban of
1: RamdomRClickEvery(2 + Random(30));
2: hoverskill(‘mining’, false);
3: (‘random’, false);
4: DoEmote(1 + Random(20));
5: BoredEvery(9 + random (21));
6: PickUpMouse;
7: LeaveScreenEvery(10 + Random(5));
8: RotateEvery(20 + Random(5));
end;

procedure hello;
begin
if inchat(‘hello’)or
inchat(‘hi’)or
inchat(‘hey’)or
inchat(‘yo’)or
inchat(name)then
typesend(‘hello’)or
inchat(name)then
typesend(‘hi’)or
inchat(name)then
typesend(‘hey’)or
inchat(name)then
typesend(‘yo’)
end;

procedure whatsup;
begin
if inchat(‘whats up’)or
inchat(‘whats new’)or
inchat(name)then
typesend(‘whats up’)or
inchat(name)then
typesend(‘whats new’)
end;

procedure friends;
begin
if inchat(‘friends’)or
inchat(‘frends’)or
inchat(‘friend’)or
inchat(‘frend’)or
inchat(‘buddys’)or
inchat(‘buddies’)or
inchat(‘budies’)or
inchat('buddys’or
inchat(‘buddy’)or
inchat(‘buddie’)or
inchat(‘budie’)or
inchat(‘buddy’)then
typesend(‘sorry,i have too many friends’)
end;

procedure haterandoms;
begin
findnormalrandoms;
wait(1000);
findtalk;
wait(1000);
finddead;
wait(1000);
findmime;
wait(1000);
findmaze;
wait(1000);
findquiz;
wait(1000);
findscaperune;
wait(1000);
clicktocontinue;
wait(1000);
solvefrog;
wait(1000)
findtalk;
wait(1000);
findmod;
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
repeat
minero;
dropal;
ban;
repeat
hello;
repeat
whatsup;
repeat
friends;
repeat
haterandoms;
repeat
until(false)
end.
[/code]
That should do it[/quote]

Steady on with the repeats! You only need one!

Read full topic

item.title: Freezing script
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

i didnt look at the whole script you posted reece, but i was looking in the main loop and i see some mistakes you have made. there is a repeat and then a until right after each other. that doesnt do anything. and you have like 5 repeats and 1 until, all in the main loop.

Read full topic

item.title: Freezing script
item.dc:creator: @reece844 reece844
item.description:
@reece844 wrote:

[code]program New;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

const rockwait= 2000;
const rockcolor=9859920;

procedure minero;
begin
repeat
findcolorspiral(x,y,rockcolor,3,3,515,336)
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
istextat2(9,9,‘Mine’,20)
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
wait(rockwait+random(300))
until(invfull)
if (invfull = true) then
end;

Procedure dropal;
begin
dropto(2,28);
end;

procedure ban;
var
NoBan : Integer;
begin
if( not (loggedin))then Exit;
noban:=random(120)
case noban of
1: RamdomRClickEvery(2 + Random(30));
2: hoverskill(‘mining’, false);
3: (‘random’, false);
4: DoEmote(1 + Random(20));
5: BoredEvery(9 + random (21));
6: PickUpMouse;
7: LeaveScreenEvery(10 + Random(5));
8: RotateEvery(20 + Random(5));
end;

procedure hello;
begin
if inchat(‘hello’)or
inchat(‘hi’)or
inchat(‘hey’)or
inchat(‘yo’)or
inchat(name)then
typesend(‘hello’)or
inchat(name)then
typesend(‘hi’)or
inchat(name)then
typesend(‘hey’)or
inchat(name)then
typesend(‘yo’)
end;

procedure whatsup;
begin
if inchat(‘whats up’)or
inchat(‘whats new’)or
inchat(name)then
typesend(‘whats up’)or
inchat(name)then
typesend(‘whats new’)
end;

procedure friends;
begin
if inchat(‘friends’)or
inchat(‘frends’)or
inchat(‘friend’)or
inchat(‘frend’)or
inchat(‘buddys’)or
inchat(‘buddies’)or
inchat(‘budies’)or
inchat('buddys’or
inchat(‘buddy’)or
inchat(‘buddie’)or
inchat(‘budie’)or
inchat(‘buddy’)then
typesend(‘sorry,i have too many friends’)
end;

procedure haterandoms;
begin
findnormalrandoms;
wait(1000);
findtalk;
wait(1000);
finddead;
wait(1000);
findmime;
wait(1000);
findmaze;
wait(1000);
findquiz;
wait(1000);
findscaperune;
wait(1000);
clicktocontinue;
wait(1000);
solvefrog;
wait(1000)
findtalk;
wait(1000);
findmod;
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
repeat
minero;
dropal;
ban;
repeat
hello;
repeat
whatsup;
repeat
friends;
repeat
haterandoms;
repeat
until(false)
end.
[/code]
That should do it

Read full topic

item.title: Freezing script
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

You see the last ‘end.’? That’s the last end ever called, it needs a begin and it will be ‘the main line’ ect. It’s the order of events and how they will happen in SCAR.

Read full topic

item.title: Freezing script
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

Im making an autominer and its extremely basic right now and when i run the script the script just freezes,heres my script

[code]program New;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

const rockwait= 2000;
const rockcolor=9859920;

procedure minero;
begin
repeat
findcolorspiral(x,y,rockcolor,3,3,515,336)
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
istextat2(9,9,‘Mine’,20)
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
wait(rockwait+random(300))
until(invfull)
if (invfull = true) then
end;

Procedure dropal;
begin
dropto(2,28);
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
repeat
minero;
dropal;
until(false)
end.

procedure ban;
var
NoBan : Integer;
begin
if( not (loggedin))then Exit;
noban:=random(120)
case noban of
1: RamdomRClickEvery(2 + Random(30));
2: hoverskill(‘mining’, false);
3: (‘random’, false);
4: DoEmote(1 + Random(20));
5: BoredEvery(9 + random (21));
6: PickUpMouse;
7: LeaveScreenEvery(10 + Random(5));
8: RotateEvery(20 + Random(5));
end;

procedure hello;
begin
if inchat(‘hello’)or
inchat(‘hi’)or
inchat(‘hey’)or
inchat(‘yo’)or
inchat(name)then
typesend(‘hello’)or
inchat(name)then
typesend(‘hi’)or
inchat(name)then
typesend(‘hey’)or
inchat(name)then
typesend(‘yo’)
end;

procedure whatsup;
begin
if inchat(‘whats up’)or
inchat(‘whats new’)or
inchat(name)then
typesend(‘whats up’)or
inchat(name)then
typesend(‘whats new’)
end;

procedure friends;
begin
if inchat(‘friends’)or
inchat(‘frends’)or
inchat(‘friend’)or
inchat(‘frend’)or
inchat(‘buddys’)or
inchat(‘buddies’)or
inchat(‘budies’)or
inchat('buddys’or
inchat(‘buddy’)or
inchat(‘buddie’)or
inchat(‘budie’)or
inchat(‘buddy’)then
typesend(‘sorry,i have too many friends’)
end;

procedure haterandoms;
begin
findnormalrandoms;
wait(1000);
findtalk;
wait(1000);
finddead;
wait(1000);
findmime;
wait(1000);
findmaze;
wait(1000);
findquiz;
wait(1000);
findscaperune;
wait(1000);
clicktocontinue;
wait(1000);
solvefrog;
wait(1000)
findtalk;
wait(1000);
findmod;
end;

end.[/code]

Is it freezing just because i hardly have a script there or what?
